title: FURNISHED and ALL BILLS PAID Modern Condo Available NOW!
posting_body: Fully furnished modern condo in the heart of East Austin available NOW for month to month leasing.
All bills paid, including super fast Wi-Fi and Chromecast.
Perfect for traveling nurses, doctors, or other professionals.
Open to short-term or long-term renting as well.
Located in the hot East Side neighborhood with easy access to parks, restaurants, gym studios, and grocery stores.
Walk to Whole Foods, Target, OrangeTheory, Black Swan Yoga, Suerte, Zilker Brewing Company and much more!
Minutes from the Plaza Saltillo metro station and less than a mile from I-35 and downtown.
Bedroom has en suite bathroom with oversized shower.
Chic barn door separates bedroom from living room for total darkness.
Open concept kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, quiet-close cabinets, and gas stove.
Exceptional construction makes it difficult to hear neighbors so you have peace and quiet.
Juliet balcony gives you a great view of the Austin skyline.
Condo building includes onsite pool, outdoor patio with grills, conference room and entertainment room.
Parking garage is gated with assigned spot on same floor as condo and EV charging for easy access.
